website_summaries.verdict: This vape travel case is designed to accommodate even the largest box mods.
pros: Equipped with a heavy flap to help you secure your vape accessories
Features a belt loop with reinforced stitching so you can easily attach the case to a belt or backpack
Includes 4 spacious pockets, along with a rear pocket that you can use to hold your ID or business card
cons: Pricey in comparison to similar cases
Pouch to hold e-juice is very small

customer_reviews.title: NIIIIIIIICE case!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on reviews and received today. This vaping mod case is NICE. It's absolutely perfect to hold my Smok Alien 220, a 60mL bottle of juice and the USB charging cable with room for more...with extra pockets as well as extra room for a larger mod which is great because I have a ModShield silicone sleeve on the way, and I'm sure I won't have an issue when that gets put on. This case is high quality and looks like it'll hold up for a long while. The belt loop and strap are also great and convenient features. There's really nothing negative I can say about this thing. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jville808

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be well made but there are some problems with design. The belt clip does not swivel, so when you sit down the vape is almost at a 90 degree angle and your vape may leak, my AL85 did. It also will not stand up on its own so if you go to stand it up on a flat surface it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cook

customer_reviews.title: The overall quality of the product itself is A+!  Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! I have a large Mod and the fit was perfect! I could fit my Mod, vape juice and replacement coils with room to spare. Many ways to carry it too. The overall quality of the product itself is A+! Very well made. I can carry my large vape juice or small just fine.
customer_reviews.author: LcCPagan0407

customer_reviews.title: Not very big pockets in back of bag
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this case better then the other one I bought (with national flag on it ) only because it has a carrying strap other one did not all though the pockets could be bigger I can barely put one finger in them so I don't understand how one review said big enough for my batteries it is NOT its only going to fit your mod box one juice on the side and possibly one coil very snugly
customer_reviews.author: ruth g.

customer_reviews.title: Vape is handy and hands are free.  YAY
customer_reviews.text: This vape case accommodates my various needs for vaping and leaves my hands free to do tasks. I train dogs and depending on our activities I may want to have it around my neck, attached to my treat bag or to my jeans. This case is too large for my eLeaf Pico but it keeps it safe so I am happy. I do wish Klouders would make a smaller size just like this for those of us who use small vape mods. All in all I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Warren

customer_reviews.title: not perfectly comfortable but better then carrying all ur vape stuff loosely
customer_reviews.text: Pros: holds all I need Cons: i prefer the clip but its so tight its hard to clip on pocket or belt and it kind of leans out...not perfectly comfortable but better then carrying all ur vape stuff loosely. The stitching around the juice pocket is a bit sloppy, it twists the contours of the bag and ruins a “smooth” design. Overall...useful...but dont expect to go out in public looking stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Crook

customer_reviews.title: Great little carrying case with cool design
customer_reviews.text: Great little carrying case with cool design, fits all of my 7 different Vapes, from a smoke micro one R80 box mod with tfv 12 micro tank, to a eleaf istick pick..I use the accessory pockets to fit a 30mL bottle of juice, a charger and a couple coils, and don't have to worry about getting scratched up in my pocket, and getting your mouthpiece full of debris and pocket lint lol
customer_reviews.author: Deadhead4L

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy, love the optional shoulder strap!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this case. I bought this case because of the shoulder strap. I love it! As a woman who often wears leggings and dresses, things like the included belt clip and carabiner often can't be used because of my clothing. I was pleasantly surprised by the extremely high quality of the construction. Very, very sturdy! Worth the price. I love being able to carry it like a purse over my shoulder if I'm wearing a dress. However, it's so well-built that I would highly recommend this case for dudes who are hard on their gear or work in construction, etc. It will hold up! The strap is detachable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: My GeekVape Aegis Legend 200W looks pretty alright in this holster-like case. It's a little cramped and awkward with a silicone case on the mod and a tank central to the mod's design. The fabric quality is slightly cheaper in texture and appearance than I expected. The strap, D-rings, and little carabiner on the back are random, but potentially useful. The juice pocket is a plus; your juice can be wherever you are, in an easy-to-access spot. All in all, it does a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2HateMe

customer_reviews.title: Best E–cig Case Money Can Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best e–cig case on the market. I carry my fluid a large battery a Ageis e–cig. All on my belt. I have 2 one for going out and the other one when I am working on a car, painting, doing construction etc.. I usually wear them out in a year. Then purchase 2 more. I am constantly putting the ecig in and out as well as fluid. I think for how much I use them and how hard I am on them they really wear well.
customer_reviews.author: America

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Case
customer_reviews.text: I love that this case isn't crazy big. It works perfectly with my Armour Pro, holding just what I need. Even if I happen to have another bigger bag, it's a nice place to keep all my vape needs together in one place. And if you're just carrying this case, they cover every option - shoulder strap, carabiner, belt clip, and even belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: CA-Orsi

customer_reviews.title: Just right for most carry situations.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or small. Used with a various box mods (square, rounded) and tanks no problem. Can hold a small bottle on side for the night. Little worried the velcro might wear out but still holds quite well. Can attach to my work back pack no problem either with the metal clip or I can use my D-Clips and mount to my shoulder straps. For on person carry easily covered with shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Parrdacc

customer_reviews.title: Really good mod carry pouch
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bit skeptical that my mod would fit cause it is a unlimited arms race (one of the medium to bigger mods). To my happy surprise fits snuggly into the case the battery pocket on the inside seems to be made for single battery mods but the other pocket for chargers will fit two 18650 batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gary coffer

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made well enough, The pocket for the mod is rather large and mine doesn't really sit firmly in the pocket. The back pockets are basically too small for anything but a pen or pencil. The pocket for the juice is again, a little bit too large for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Foster

customer_reviews.title: Lining coming apart after a week
customer_reviews.text: So got this a week ago or so. Initaly really happy with it. My mod fit nicely along with a charging cable and even a backup mod. The problem started several days ago when I took my vape out and the lining on the side came out with my mod. Since then the lining has been coming off in chunks. Really disappointed with that fact. If it wasn't for the li ing issue I would give this 5 stars, as it's exactly what I needed for at work and works great for keeping my vape close at hand and not being knocked around.
customer_reviews.author: A. MACKIN

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Way way too big for what the product calls for. It says it will fit a smok devilkin and it definitely fits and very loose and move around quite a bit. And very chintzy looking not a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Justin Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for my Smok mod, backup batteries and ejuice glass (60ml). the belt clip works nicely, the velcro strap is very secure and the glass bottle retainer has not gotten worn out in more than a year of use. Highly recommended for the vape fan.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Boose

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit bigger than I was expecting. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than I was expecting.I can actually fit my Smok Al85 and 60 ml refill tube making the side carrier unless to me..This was the only pouch I could find at the time for my needs and it has meet those needs..
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to carry all the vaping accessories loosely and I would constantly leave my juice at home when I would need a refill. The Klouders bag keeps everything together and organized. Great case! Will recommend to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: DancingEva

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Ripped right after a month of use
customer_reviews.author: Jmantis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly what he needed!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a pouch to carry an vaporizer. This worked great for the vaporizer. The juice didn't fit in the side pouch but that was not the primary reason we got it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for when I'm out in the yard cutting the grass as my vape and my snap mini often fell out of my pockets on the mower, I dont use it as often as I thought but when I do great.
customer_reviews.author: Big Frost Gaming

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at Christmas for my husband and he loves it, especially the ability to wear it on his neck and easily access it when riding the ATV or things of this nature. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift, something for my son to b able to carry his vape. He hasn't used it yet but he really like the fact he now has something to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about this product when I first started vaping it is very well made, built to last. I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I expected. Study , made : sewn well. Design is almost perfect for my vape system. ... only thing would change of given a choice is ... inside on back it has two small pockets. One is a little larger than the other . I would prefer they be the same size . But I am extremely please with this as is too!
customer_reviews.author: linda foster anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not the most secure. But gret wonce you adjust
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i don't like is it knocks the tip off everythime i close the flap, nees a pocket to safely put tips.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Fee

customer_reviews.title: Nice case strap should be longer and wider
customer_reviews.text: Love this case but the strap is too short for a woman to carry over shoulder or crossbody, the reason I purchase it for. The case itself is great to carry mod and will fit a 60 mil gorilla style bottle on the side
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a case for my vape box, batteries and juice. This is perfect. I do not have to worry about it falling into my purse or backpack, it does what it is supposed to do. Will totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris63109

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but I didn't realize until I bought another one for my husband that the belt clip on the back is upside down. Actually, I noticed it and thought it was strange but wasn't necessarily going to use it like that, so I wasn't too worried about it. I very much like the pouch and it fits different types of mods. I took a star for the fact that mine is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Cherub106

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift to the Husband. Gladly, he liked it and it was perfect. The fact that it’s versatile was a plus for him. Grateful, that he doesn’t have to bug me to carry his vape and juices in my bag for him whenever we are on the go lol!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for SMOK Species, It’s too small. My small mod wouldn’t fit in. I don’t know what this is made for. Plus no room for anything else, just a small juice.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Deppen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if the case were a little stiffer, it tends to fold in while trying to insert the mod into it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The container pocket on the side came undone the first time I put something on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints other than perhaps making the side pouch loop clasp Velcro to accommodate placing 1 60ml plastic bottle or 1 or 2 30ml plastic squeeze bottles instead of 1 60ml glass bottle as the loop has no give to it and only secures a 60 ml bottle.
customer_reviews.author: GamerX

customer_reviews.title: Stylish vaping case
customer_reviews.text: My husband love everything about vaping and he always carry his mods in his jeans packets but with this he not need to be worry about that maybe fall and break or space in his jeans pockets! With this his carry everything he needs with him and with style! Is a really nice gift for the man in your life that love vaping!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Yasser

customer_reviews.title: really like the case
customer_reviews.text: really like the case. Small enough to carry on my person but large enough to fit multiple items. I wish they had a simple handle option to carry instead of the long strap. Overall, really satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Noblit

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made from cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a hiker all my life so I've bought plenty of pouches. This one looked good in the photos. If you paid $10 dollars for this you'd be paying three times what it's worth. $45 is theft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs some miner changes
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice case, but they could do a better job with the stitching, parts of it fray at the stitching. Also, all the pockets are really tight they are so tight that it is hard to get my mod out and my extra batteries. Lastly, the clip is too low the placement needs to be a couple of inches higher so it is not top-heavy.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This vapor pouch is perfect for those times when you're out and about running errands (etc..) with your favorite mod. The quality of the material is also quite good. This will likely last me for a good while. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jredheadgirl

customer_reviews.title: Holds my vape kite amazingly well for carry on travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds my vape kite amazingly well for carry on travel. Always put Saran wrap over bottles and tighten lid on them so they don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Piglet LaBeef

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping in coat pocket.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it only holds the skinny e-liquid bottles. But I knew that when I ordered. Mine came with belt clip, carry strap, and carabiner. It keeps my mod from tipping over in my coat pocket so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Quality construction!! Many compliments from other Vapers!! Would definitely recommend this to anyone who vapes on the go!!
customer_reviews.author: PETER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love it , Can be carried so many ways, around neck, shoulder, clipped to a belt very sturdy, hold's everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Versatile for every need. Love mine so much I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Taymon Sampson

customer_reviews.title: FALLING APART !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it a month and the pocket you store your juice in is already falling apart !!! Other then that I like the case , but I don't think it will last 6 months from now !!
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed the case
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the case.. wasn’t sure if it would work for a couple of mods that I own but it does plus able to hold extra battery and juice... awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haile

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it could be cheaper than 20 bucks, but a nice product, doesnt stay on hip that well
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time, product looks great, works great, stitching is great not tearing
customer_reviews.author: frootloopy

customer_reviews.title: ... mag vape mode with a prince v12 tank fits perfect love it cant
customer_reviews.text: I have a a smok mag vape mode with a prince v12 tank fits perfect love it cant complain
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: What i was looking for in a travel pouch. Kept my vape upright without being too bulky. Easy to carry and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, but a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: The Assembly of the product is good. But the tolerances of the openings for products are tight. I'm hoping they will loosen up as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Tester

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Perfect for hiking, fishing, theme parks or pretty much any casual outdoor activities so you don't have to jam your mod, liquid and/or extra batteries in your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, boyfriend loved it, perfect size and reliable. Boyfriend is happy and always using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Estevez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I have used it for many many mods. And have had zero issue.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Well made mod case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made case. Agree with other reviewers about the case is for a large mod but only has a slot for one spare battery (design flaw). Nice looking and has a solid Velcro strap. Recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case! My vaporizer fits perfectly. And accessories too! Nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Tari

customer_reviews.title: Does the job if you vape a 30ml bottle every where you go.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked how it's very loose, weather on your hip or through the belt. Its shakes around alot, and pretty small for my geekmod. Only holds tall skinny bottles can't fit a 100ml bottle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even for larger mods.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can carry my mod, 60 ml of fluid and two batteries in it on the go without having to worry if my mod will fall over!
customer_reviews.author: A. Keough

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful to me anymore
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was a good product good stitching quality very roomy very versatile meaning that it can be thrown over your shoulders worn on your belt or even hook onto your bag personally I'd rather Trust having the strap over my shoulder to carry or clipping it onto my bag. For a bag that carries your Vape this is on the price pricier side but it's one of the better made ones
customer_reviews.author: MiasmicXanax808

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not too fond. Wouldn’t recomend. Not the best fit. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Belt clip doesn't detach, but still has belt loop
customer_reviews.text: After a year the Velcro wouldn't fasten. The top edge started to tear. Overall, I feel I got good use out of this pouch for the money.
customer_reviews.author: roger r.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It’s well made but it advertises for my vape mod and accessories and I can barely get my mod to fit let alone getting anything else in there.
customer_reviews.author: JBusick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Main pocket roomy but other pockets are a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Cliffy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pouch to hold my mod
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pouch to hold my mod. This is the only one that actually fits my big vape mod. It came in excellent condition as described. Well made. It can hold everything including your liquid and batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sergej D.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition as describe works perfect for my kangertech mini tank very satisified!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T.Star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, fits up to all you need for a day of vaping away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: It latches with look and loop system
customer_reviews.text: this wears out quickly a clip system would work better. Velcro opens easy when you rub against anything.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDETTE SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great case fit my smok alien 220w with silicone case ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case fit my smok alien 220w with silicone case on it just fine. I wear it on my belt it gets in the way of my seat belt and i have to pull my mod out not a big deal i done use a extra e-juice bottle yet but i will have to pull that out or take off the case from my belt. All in all its a nice case well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cyclinguy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Like it it straps perfect on my backpack and easy to grab while I'm biking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy compact setup.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy compact setup. Nice quality and roomy for my Dripbox starter kit and its accessories. What I like is the side pocket, it fits 30ml juice bottle. Yes, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BVV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and a perfect fit...i love this case and will be ordering another
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how it looks
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the photo. Everything was nice and my vape fit inside well.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good product I think the brand it’s expensive, quality good like others with nice brand

customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was able to fit my Smok Alien 220w pretty well. The packaging was pretty too which was a nice touch.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: Mine is coming apart at the seams already a month old.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the right bag for my Limitless LUX 215W Mod. Its the right size so everything fits in one bag. Convenient, fast and easy ... I recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pouch! Has a lot of space and doesn't feel cheap/ Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: It really needs more velcro to make it more secure ...
customer_reviews.text: It really needs more velcro to make it more secure the material is very stiff but it's new so I can expect that all in all I'm happy

customer_reviews.title: I dont like the product is to expensive for a bag and ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the product is to expensive for a bag and it doesnt wven bring the vapor. If it included something else it would actually worth the prize.

customer_reviews.title: My order is no complete all I have is my ...
customer_reviews.text: My order is no complete all I have is my bag carrie No accessories no liquid please send the rest of my stuff

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced empty case
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because all I got was an empty case which was overpriced.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t really use the 60ml or smaller bottles so this was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The pouch for juices can’t even hold big bottles of juice. I don’t really use the 60ml or smaller bottles so this was a waste of money

product_meta.title: Vape Case Accessories Vapor Pouch for Travel Carrying Bag Holder to Carry Your Vape Box Mods Full Kit with Tank Vaping Supplies Holster Organizer for e Juice Battery Black Klouders [CASE ONLY]
feature_bullets: GREAT VAPE ORGANIZER - Premium solution for organizing and carrying your vape mod and its accessories.

CONVENIENT AND FUNCTIONAL - 4 comfy pockets in vape holster. Rear pocket great for fast and convenient access to your visas, photo id, business cards, keys. Velcro on the flap designed for easy access and closure. Not all type of vape mode may fit to this case. Please refer to its measurements (5 1/2" H x 2 3/4" W x 1 1/8 D)
BEST PROTECTION - The best way to secure your device from scratching or getting lost or wet. Keeps your accessories organized. Perfect for traveling!
HIGH QUALITY - Klouders vape case is made from modern and durable material with reinforced stitching.
GREAT GIFT - Beautifully designed packaging makes vape organizer very impressive.

specifications.Inside Pockets: Beautifully designed packaging makes vape organizer very impressive. You can be proud to give it as a gift.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars259 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
